```{r}
ref = st_read("data/reference_data.gpkg")
```


```{r}
table(ref$region)
table(ref$lcc1)
table(ref$lcc2)
table(ref$set)
```


# Training and Test


```{r}

train_data = ref %>% filter(set == "training")
test_data = ref %>% filter(set == "testing")


train_data = train_data %>% filter(lcc2 != "sand")




train_sample = train_data %>% group_by(lcc2) %>% slice_sample(n = 2500)
st_write(train_sample, "lcc_modelling/data/training_samples.gpkg")

test_sample = test_data %>% group_by(lcc2) %>% slice_sample(n = 2500)
st_write(test_sample, "lcc_modelling/data/test_samples.gpkg")



```
